segment.source: User Interface Advanced Group Policy Management
segment.target: User Interface Advanced Group Policy Management

segment.source: User Interface Advanced Group Policy Management
segment.target: User Interface Advanced Group Policy Management

segment.source: User Interface: Advanced Group Policy Management
segment.target: User Interface: Advanced Group Policy Management

segment.source: Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) adds a Change Control node to each domain displayed in the Group Policy Management Console (GPMC).
segment.target: Advanced Group Policy Management (AGPM) adds a Change Control node to each domain displayed in the Group Policy Management Console (GPMC).

segment.source: In an environment where multiple domains are managed with the GPMC, each domain is listed under the Domains node in the console tree.
segment.target: In an environment where multiple domains are managed with the GPMC, each domain is listed under the Domains node in the console tree.

segment.source: Each domain has a Change Control node under it, and there is one archive of Group Policy objects (GPOs) per domain.
segment.target: Each domain has a Change Control node under it, and there is one archive of Group Policy objects (GPOs) per domain.

segment.source: Within the details pane there are three primary tabs, providing access to both GPO-level settings and domain-level settings and commands for AGPM.
segment.target: Within the details pane there are three primary tabs, providing access to both GPO-level settings and domain-level settings and commands for AGPM.

segment.source: Contents Tab: GPO settings and commands and GPO-level delegation
segment.target: Contents Tab: GPO settings and commands and GPO-level delegation

segment.source: Domain Delegation Tab: AGPM e-mail notification settings and domain-level delegation
segment.target: Domain Delegation Tab: AGPM e-mail notification settings and domain-level delegation

segment.source: AGPM Server Tab: Domain-level archive connection settings
segment.target: AGPM Server Tab: Domain-level archive connection settings

segment.source: Administrative Template Settings: Central configuration of logging and tracing, archive locations, and the visibility of features
segment.target: Administrative Template Settings: Central configuration of logging and tracing, archive locations, and the visibility of features

segment.source: Other Enhancements to the GPMC: AGPM adds a History tab and an Extensions tab for each GPO and Group Policy link
segment.target: Other Enhancements to the GPMC: AGPM adds a History tab and an Extensions tab for each GPO and Group Policy link
